segments.text: I see the water flowing over the edge of the sink, creating a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how the woman doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so focused on the cookies, they don't notice the water either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is taking a big risk standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad that they have to sneak around like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is becoming a mess, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will slip on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so full of potential accidents, it's hard to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR
